thread.title: Audits found State Department cybersecurity deteriorated under Clinton
thread.title_full: Audits found State Department cybersecurity deteriorated under Clinton - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Audits found State Department cybersecurity deteriorated under Clinton
text: The State Department was among the worst agencies in the federal government at protecting its computer networks while Hillary Clinton was secretary from 2009 to 2013, a situation that continued to deteriorate as John Kerry took office and Russian hackers breached the department's email system, according to independent audits and interviews. ...
